svg.script: function go() { // Check that dynamic interval end times are reset during a backwards seek var svg = document.documentElement; var a = document.getElementById('a'); svg.pauseAnimations(); svg.setCurrentTime(1); a.beginElement(); // First interval 1s-2s a.endElementAt(1); svg.setCurrentTime(3); svg.setCurrentTime(1.5); // Backwards seek to 1.5s -- instance time at t=2s // should be reset svg.setCurrentTime(3); // Should still be active svg.removeAttribute("class"); }
